website_summaries.verdict: The standard Ion Air Pro is a rugged sports camcorder that is easy to use with many thoughtful features, but the addition of Wi-Fi and app connectivity makes it a truly standout camera.
pros: The Ion Air Pro is waterproof up to 30 meters and shock resistant
HD video is easy to capture with the record slider
Photos can be captured without stopping video capture
Wi-Fi Podz add-on allows syncing, remote viewing, and simple controls via an iOS app or Web browser
cons: The nonrotating lens makes orienting shots at odd angles tricky
No SD card is included in the box

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera to use it on my bicycle and to be able to connect it with my phone through wifi but the battery dies really fast when using wifi pod, very shortly after the pod itself broke and I was not able to connect. I sent it back to be fixed and shortly after getting it back it broke again and I was not able to connect it to my phone. One of the flaps of the clip also broke off as it was not durable enough. I learned that it's better to buy a product that is quality made like GoPro. I don't recommend this model or product.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Excelent camera  !!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a go pro hero but lost it somewhere at the bottom of the ocean in Roatan Island while free-diving so I needed another one to save my adventures in the water and I saw this cam with a nice price so I give it a chance. Item works great just got my hands on it and had to in the water with it. Video quality is very good and doesn't need no protective case since the whole cam is water proof up to 10m , it has this nice function to connect wifi with my android and you can watch what you're recording live. Overall love the cam and gonna keep exploring with it.
customer_reviews.author: Johan

customer_reviews.title: Not so waterproof after all
customer_reviews.text: We purchased it to take a trip to the Caribbean and do some snorkeling. I read all the instructions, ensured the cover was on tight and locked, and within 5 minutes the camera stopped working. The deepest I got while snorkeling was ~7 feet. I have now read other reviews that seem to have the same issue. The design of the seal doesn't seem to be sufficient for any type of full submersion. I am sure it would be OK to get wet here and there, but if you plan on going underwater, keep looking. On the plus side, the camera mounts were solid and all other design features were nice. The vibe feedback to power on/record worked great.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it for WiFi
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for the purpose of monitoring a stage during large meetings. This is probably a great camera but the WiFi will exhaust the battery in about 70-80 minutes! My meetings are over 90 minutes long so the WiFi was not a great help at all. In addition, the WiFi kept disconnecting and I had to re-connect again (takes several seconds) so I've missed few things that happened on the stage. Just returned it and going for the GoPro Hero3 Black Edition.

product_meta.title: Ion Air Pro 1011 Wi-Fi PODZ with Helmet and Bike Kit HD Sports Video Camera
product_meta.description: Introducing the new AIR PRO WIFI which includes the ION Bike & Helmet Kit and the ION Connect Kit for the ultimate adventure HD recording experience. The new ION AIR PRO, from ION Worldwide, is one of the first Smart Phone compatible action cameras that allows users to shoot high definition video and share in real time via social networking sites. So now, your latest ski run can be uploaded to your Facebook page before you've even taken off your ski boots!. This clever electronic device comprises two parts: the ION AIR PRO action camera, when fitted with the included accessory - The ION Wi-Fi PODZ, enables users to replay video footage and seamlessly transfer it to YouTube, Facebook or the Internet without the need for a computer or cables. The product's "Shoot & Share" Technology is also fully compatible with both iOS (iPod/iPhone/iPad) and Android devices. This allows users to control the AIR PRO camera functions and settings direct from a Smartphone or Tablet. The relevant iOS Apps can be downloaded free of charge from ION WorldWide via iTunes. An Android APP will also be available in the near future. Additionally, the CamLOCK Mounting System allows users to attach the AIR PRO camera to any type of helmet such as motor and mountain bike, ski, skydive as well as a handlebar attachment for mounting the camera onto bicycles, jet skis, 4x4 off roadsters and motor bikes. The CamLOCK Mounting System is designed to be flexible and record video from all angles without the need to re-mount the camera. Box Contains: ION AIR PRO Camera, USB Cable, Audio/Video Cable, USB Adaptor, Pouch, Tripod, Securing string, CamLOCK, Ball Joint short, Bike Mount, Ball joint L Shape, Helmet mount. Warranty: 1 year from the date of purchase. Customer Service: ION Worldwide believes you should get answers when you need them, so we offer support from our service center located in the US.
feature_bullets: Lightweight - lighter than 4.5 oz., it's one of the lightest action cameras in the industry

No raincoat required - waterproof to 30-Feet, complete with waterproof microphone to enable high quality audio while offering protection from the elements. This device does not need an additional waterproof outer casing
The optional ION Wi-Fi PODZ attachment offers real time shoot & share
Simple to use one touch function allows simultaneous camera start, record and still image capture all with one finger
HD recording - 1080p, 960p and 720p video resolution recording, FREE 8 GB cloud storage on the ION CLOUD
